job_description: Google is looking for a talented software engineer to join our team. You will work on exciting projects and collaborate with some of the best engineers in the industry.
job_responsibility: Design, develop, and maintain software applications. Write high-quality code and perform code reviews. Work with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products.
education_requirement: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
experience: 3+ years of experience in software engineering.

job_description: Mozilla is looking for a skilled frontend developer to join our team. You will work on our flagship product, Firefox, and help us shape the future of the web.
job_responsibility: Develop and maintain frontend code for Firefox. Collaborate with UX designers and product managers to deliver high-quality user experiences. Write automated tests to ensure code quality.
education_requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
experience: 5+ years of experience in frontend development.

job_description: Apple is looking for a talented iOS developer to join our team. You will work on our flagship product, the iPhone, and help us deliver the best user experiences in the industry.
job_responsibility: Design, develop, and maintain iOS applications. Write high-quality code and perform code reviews. Work with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products.
education_requirement: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
experience: 3+ years of experience in iOS development.

job_description: Samsung is looking for a skilled Android developer to join our team. You will work on our flagship products, including the Galaxy smartphone and tablet line, and help us deliver innovative and cutting-edge mobile experiences.
job_responsibility: Design, develop, and maintain Android applications. Write high-quality code and perform code reviews. Work with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products.
education_requirement: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
experience: 5+ years of experience in Android development.

job_description: Netflix is seeking a talented backend engineer to join our team. You will work on our streaming platform, which delivers high-quality video to millions of users worldwide.
job_responsibility: Design, develop, and maintain scalable backend systems. Write high-quality code and perform code reviews. Work with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products.
education_requirement: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
experience: 5+ years of experience in backend development.

job_description: HBO Max is looking for a talented content producer to join our team. You will help us produce original content that will be seen by millions of viewers around the world.
job_responsibility: Develop, produce, and manage original content for HBO Max. Work with writers, directors, and talent to bring projects to life. Manage budgets and schedules to ensure projects are delivered on time and on budget.
education_requirement: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Film Production or a related field.
experience: 3+ years of experience in content production.
